peopleAlsoAsk.question: Are vintage Longines watches valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: There are no cheap vintage Longines watches because they were designed with high-quality materials, and most of them have increased in value over the years. You should be wary of anyone trying to sell you a cheap vintage Longines.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Vintage Longines Watches: The ULTIMATE Buyer's Guide

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How can I tell how old my Longines watch is?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: To determine the approximate age of your watch, open the case and find the serial number, usually found engraved on the movement or the case back itself, then match it up with the list on this page. Cross reference the Movement number with the case number to find the time scale of when your watch was produced.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Do Longines watches hold their value?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Longines watches are an excellent investment as they retain their value over time. The watches are equipped with amazing features and stand out with their style and design, making them highly popular.
